snippet: For Julius Yego, the lone Kenyan not competing in a running event at the Olympics, just making it to the London Games is “a glorious thing.”
abstract: Inside The Rings; Profile of Julius Yego, the first Kenyan to compete in the javelin in the Olympics who hopes to qualify for the championship round; 43 other Kenyans are competing at the 2012 Olympics, all of which are runners.
lead_paragraph: For Julius Yego, the lone Kenyan not competing in a running event at the Olympics, just making it to the London Games is “a glorious thing.”

headline.seo: For Kenya’s Julius Yego, the Javelin Beats Running
headline.main: For One Kenyan Olympian, Throwing Beats Running
headline.print_headline: For One Kenyan Olympian, Throwing Beats Running
